column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////I ordered the berry bliss crepes & they were DELICIOUS! I'm a fan of anything w/ berries in it
column2: but these crepes were amazing. They weren't too sweet or too bland. I feel like some crepes are too bland & just taste like... egg? Idk
column3: but there was a perfect amount of flavor! I also got a side of hashbrowns & they were also good :)
